hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT [HOUSEINTID] as Id ,[INTSTART] as IntStart ,[INTEND] as IntStart ,[INTGUID] as IdGuid ,[AOGUID] as ParentId ,[INTSTATUS] as InsStatus FROM [fias_HOUSEINT] WHERE [AOGUID] = :ParentId
SELECT [HOUSEINTID] as Id ,[INTSTART] as IntStart ,[INTEND] as IntStart ,[INTGUID] as IdGuid ,[AOGUID] as ParentId ,[INTSTATUS] as InsStatus FROM [fias_HOUSEINT] WHERE [HOUSEINTID] = :Id
